span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 陈旧的： worn-out, as from overuse; trite
【例】 the shopworn suggestion to job applicants to “just be yourself” 老掉牙的让应征者“做你自己”的提议
【近】 banal, cliché, commonplace, hackneyed, trite, well-worn
【反】 new, fresh, novel, original, unclichéd, unhackneyed 新的

【记】 worn wear 用旧的过去分词
